skill.name: dependency-upgrade
skill.description: Manage major dependency version upgrades with compatibility analysis, staged rollout, and comprehensive testing. Use when upgrading framework versions, updating major dependencies, or managing breaking changes in libraries.
skill.summary: Manage major dependency version upgrades with compatibility analysis, staged rollout, and comprehens...
skill.author: wshobson

content.value_statement: Major upgrades can break builds and tests without a plan. This skill provides staged steps, compatibility checks, and testing guidance.
seo_keywords: depen plan. This skill provides staged steps, compatibility checks, and testing guidance.
actual_capabilities: Explains semantic versioning impact with examples for upgrade scope
Outlines phased upgrade strategy with planning, updates, and validation
Provides compatibility matrix examples for React ecosystem packages
Details unit, integration, visual, and E2E testing guidance
Shows rollback workflow with git and reinstall steps
Includes Renovate and Dependabot configuration examples
limitations: Does not run upgrade commands or change project files
Examples focus on JavaScript and npm tooling
Does not build a project specific compatibility matrix
Requires manual review of changelogs and migration guides

use_cases.title: Plan a React major upgrade
use_cases.description: Create a staged plan with compatibility checks and tests before changing core UI dependencies.

use_cases.title: Set upgrade automation rules
use_cases.description: Define Renovate and Dependabot policies for major and minor updates with safe review gates.

use_cases.title: Design upgrade test coverage
use_cases.description: Map unit, integration, and E2E tests to validate behavior after dependency upgrades.

prompt_templates.title: Simple upgrade plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a staged plan to upgrade React from 17 to 18 with test checkpoints after each step.

prompt_templates.title: Compatibility checklist
prompt_templates.prompt: List compatibility checks for React, React DOM, and React Router upgrades, including peer dependencies.

prompt_templates.title: Testing coverage map
prompt_templates.prompt: Propose unit, integration, and E2E tests to validate a major framework upgrade in a production web app.

prompt_templates.title: Automation policy
prompt_templates.prompt: Recommend Renovate and Dependabot rules for handling major updates safely and reducing update noise.

output_examples.input: Plan an upgrade from React 16 to 18 with minimal downtime.
output: Audit current versions and peer dependencies
Upgrade one major version at a time with tests
Update router and testing libraries in sequence
Run full regression suite and monitor after release

best_practices: Upgrade one major version at a time
Run tests after each dependency change
anti_patterns: Upgrading all dependencies in one step

faq.question: Which ecosystems are supported?
faq.answer: Examples focus on npm and JavaScript, but the planning approach applies to other ecosystems.

faq.question: Are there project size limits?
faq.answer: There are no size limits, but larger projects need more staging and test coverage.

faq.question: Can it integrate with CI pipelines?
faq.answer: Yes, it provides guidance for Renovate and Dependabot that fit CI workflows.

faq.question: Does it access or store my data?
faq.answer: No, it provides guidance only and does not access files or environment data.

faq.question: What if tests fail after an upgrade?
faq.answer: Use the rollback plan, isolate the breaking change, and proceed with smaller steps.

faq.question: How does it compare to upgrade scripts?
faq.answer: It provides structured planning and testing guidance rather than automated code changes.
